name: Seatus, Etherym of Return
text: 2 level 3 Etherym monsters You can target 1 of your banished Etherym monsters, attach it to this card as Xyz material. You can detach 1 Xyz material from this card; return 1 card your opponent controls to their hand. (quick effect) You can banish 1 monster from your GY; banish this card until the next end phase. You can only activate each effect of "Seatus, Etherym of Return" once per turn.
